title: Scarlett Moffatt's birthday outrage as she screams a woman is 'f***ing laughing' at her
text:

Scarlett Moffatt was caught on video screaming "she's f***ing laughing at me" at her own birthday party.

The former Gogglebox and I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! star was celebrating her 29th birthday with her friends and family when she reportedly got into a bust-up with another reveller.

Scarlett's big night out in a London bingo hall is said to have turned sour after a woman made fun of her.

It's said the reality star turned presenter took issue with the woman laughing at her and demanded she was thrown out of the venue.

In a video obtained by The Sun , Scarlett is seen standing in the middle of a crowd, talking to a man.

(Image: Instagram)

She shouts: "She’s f***ing laughing at me. This is my birthday. She’s laughing at me, man."

Scarlett was partying with relatives and pals, as well as police officer boyfriend Scott Dobinson, when it kicked off.

TOWIE star James 'Arg' Argent was also in the crowd at Dabbers in Shoreditch, East London.

A shocked onlooker told the publication Scarlett had been in good spirits and enjoying her party until she was left feeling uncomfortable by the comments.

(Image: Getty Images)

They said: "Her outburst may have shocked people used to seeing her laughing and joking on the telly. But it was clear she had become distressed."

Before heading out, Scarlett had posted up for a snap with two of her pals.

She rocked a double denim look, heels and a white shirt, as she vowed to make the last year of her 20s the best year of her life.

(Image: Getty Images)

She captioned the picture: "Turning 29 with my favourites the girls I lived with at uni, my besties from home, my family, only missing a couple but so happy!! Let’s make this last year of my 20s the best!! Life is far too important to take sensibly remember that everybody!! #birthday #love #friends #family"

Mirror Online has contacted Scarlett's representatives for comment.
